title: just downloaded the game on a new computer and it shows the "pvp kernel stopped working"
body:
the problem is i have no files of the game because its on a new computer so i cant delete some parts of it like some of the guides say
ive tried rebooting redownloading everything,also all of the drivers and .net are updated.
please help.

replies.body:
Kernel patcher issues are generally caused by League not having the right system permissions to run. Since the League client interacts with a lot of files outside of the installation folder, it needs permission from the Operating System to do so. Our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) is a good place to start in troubleshooting this issue.

Let me know if you notice any change after working through that guide.
